headline: Mastercard Board of Directors Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: PURCHASE, N.Y., February 10, 2025--Mastercard (NYSE: MA) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 76 cents per share.

headline: Mastercard Incorporated (MA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Mastercard Incorporated (MA) on Substack by Chit Chat Stocks. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MA. Mastercard Incorporated (MA)’s share was trading at $562.75 as of Feb 7th. MA’s trailing and forward P/E were 40.51 and 35.34 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Mastercard’s Q4 2024 earnings […]
